item.title: Reply to 'jQuery, how to call a function while passing a variable' on stackoverflow at https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1831116/jquery-how-to-call-a-function-while-passing-a-variable:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Reply to 'jQuery, how to call a function while passing a variable' on stackoverflow at https://stackoverflow.com/questions/1831116/jquery-how-to-call-a-function-while-passing-a-variable:

Try wrapping it in a new function object:

$.get("InfoRetrieve", { },function() { addContent(data) });
